Consulting

People at the center:
Technology at Hand.

Digital transformation meets at the boundaries between people and technology. Setbase offers support at every step of a product journey by providing methodology simultaneously with technical expertise.

Learn more

What we offer

Our value proposition.

Strategic consulting

Our strategic consulting services empower businesses to navigate change and achieve their goals. We help to adapt business models, align technology strategies with organizational objectives, and streamline processes.

Project execution

Product Management, Product Ownership or Project Lead for agile, classic or technical projects, we help with the introduction and execution of projects in the digital domain.

Innovation

At Setbase, we view innovation as the process of renewing areas, products, or services by applying new methods, challenging the status quo, and implementing novel ideas. Our interdisciplinary methodology and technology-driven approach foster innovation designed to achieve your vision.

Fast to market strategy

We help you accelerate your journey from vision or concept to launch. We don't focus on a single methodology like agile but streamline processes with an focus on pure efficiency, thatâ€™s how we help you bring products to market quickly.

Process optimization

Unlock your potential with streamlined processes. We analyze workflows, identify inefficiencies, and implement tailored improvements to enhance productivity, reduce costs, and drive sustainable growth. Creating processes that are efficient, adaptable, and perfectly aligned.

Agile, Kanban, Waterfall & lean management

We adapt to the unique needs of each project by leveraging the most effective methodologies. Whether itâ€™s SCRUM, Kanban, Waterfall, or Lean Management3, we tailor our approach to ensure optimal results.
